Introduction
This topic contains information on and general principles for rating dental and oral conditions for compensation purposes, including
interpreting claims raising dental issues
general information on service connection (SC) for dental and oral disabilities for compensation purposes
dental/oral contentions for which compensation-purpose SC may not be established
dental examinations in compensation claims for a dental disability
denying dental claims for SC compensation
schedule of ratings for dental and oral conditions
, and
dental-oral rating schedule changes
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 14Â - Dental and Oral Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 14, Section None
